title: Drastic Zhonya's change idea
body: They should put Zhonya's on a trigger like Hexdrinker.

replies.body:
..Why on earth would you want it on a HP trigger? It would make it the only item with a detrimental active.

Yes, i know most people waste hourglass by using it at 5% hp while surrounded with no help nearby, thereby wasting the cooldown.
